tweets.text: New @Policy_Exchange report sets out the action needed to green the financial system to help tackle the #ClimateCrisis & restore #nature. Recommendations incl imandatory nature risk disclosure and NetZero transition plans for listed companies. #RaceToZero #RaceToResilience #COP26 https://t.co/7truCgY9YB

Wow, so @AnglianWater clearly now feel that they can't be bothered to reply to tweets pointing out their flooding issues. 6 weeks of pollution with sewage into @nationaltrust harbour, no word from @EnvAgencyAnglia either. https://t.co/NeJXviXhN2

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC Seems very convenient that the monitoring systems weren't connected over what was probably one of the worst few days we've experienced... Who's side are the EA on?

Teams like Maria's clear debris ‚¨áÔ∏è every day. All the time. No press releases about it, and without Twitter, you probably wouldn't even know.

But it's really important - to increase safety and reduce flood-risk.

Please call us if you see river debris: 0800 807060 #TeamEA https://t.co/AXMLhsGLL4

Absolutely disgusted @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids no investigation, monitoring conveniently not working, lying about nos of complaints. It‚Äôs either corruption or incompetence- which one is it?! #StopTheStink

tweets.text: @stuartminnikin @WildTroutTrust @YorkDalesRT @Jack_Hirst3 @Rivers2U_ydrt @yorkshire_dales @SandTCUKYorks @EnvAgencyYNE @YWT_North @BradfordCityAA Some stunning scenery but big, big, big expanses of treelessness..... and compounded by weird, fog-filtered light today. Haven't given it much attention yet, but I will

Last week our Lower Hull Field Team deployed a floating retention boom in the Broomfleet area.

They have been working with our Environment Management Team and have deployed the booms to contain a kerosene spill so it does not move further downstream. https://t.co/iExZ1I6Gmj
This is a big part of Britain‚Äôs litter problem.  Chronic lack of enforcement of laws by @EnvAgency and @HighwaysEngland @BBCJustinR https://t.co/Qv6ISawY9f

.@thameswater fined ¬£2.3m for polluting an #Oxfordshire stream with sewage that killed more than 1,110 fish from 13 different species.

READ the whole story of management failings and broken equipment ‚¨áÔ∏è.

Please call us if you suspect river #pollution: 0800 807060
#environment https://t.co/goOwgTCgMS

We have some repair tests lined up for tomorrow. We will repair 2 damages, 1 with rock bags and 1 with a clay solution. We can't wait!
#climateadaptation #floodprotection #emergencyrepair #research Thx @Rijkswaterstaat @EnvAgency @STOWAwater @Defensie @Vlaamsewaterweg @waterschap https://t.co/r15XtPVZsQ
@EnvAgency Imagine monitoring a really stinky landfill site's omissions and not having your equipment plugged in all weekend.  What an embarrassing situation. #walleysquarry #redindustries #capitoff

@cain_karlene @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC Well said, I think the word is corruption! Don‚Äôt forget RED tried to bully the MP to keep out of this last year and it might have worked as he seems to be missing from the debate most of the time!

@chrisoliver71 @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids @SimonTagg Reading this 3 days late & extremely concerned why we weren't told when we reported stench, what were we breathing & what will long term impact be, we should have been evacuated. Staying in means stay breathing the fumes.

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids @SimonTagg Aaron, we have complained to the Environment Agency who have said ‚ÄúStay Indoors and don‚Äôt go outside‚Äù. Is there going to be an evacuation if Newcastle Under Lyme today? This is getting serious.

@EnvAgencyMids @BBCRadioStoke @Sotlive @BBCWatchdog there is a human story to be told in Newcastle Under Lyme. Residents quality of life is suffering... The tools available within the current framework do nothing in resolving this prolonged issue...

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC The action being taken is seriously insufficient. Newcastle-under -Lyme literally smells like a bad restaurants swill bin.
The action being taken ensures many more months of suffering for local residents.
#WalleysQuarry needs capping off and closing down now.
Thank you.

@PHE_uk @ONS @LSHTM The people of Newcastle under Lyme are in the middle of a health crisis the smell coming from the landfill it‚Äôs affecting our health. I feel uncomfortable reporting to GP because of the pandemic. Please help #stopthestink @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2

tweets.text: #Panorama on #flytipping last night - good overview of this increasing problem. I thought @EnvAgency responses were weak and typically lacking in any real action. Why after >10 years of problems is it getting worse not better? Why is the carriers reg system still totally useless?

The incompetence of the EAs approach to Walleys Quarry knows no bounds. Pack up the monitoring equipment - tens of thousands of people with noses are reporting the nuisance.  Shut it down - cap it off. #stopthestink  @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC You are, try living with the smell day in and day out, it's making me I'll

tweets.text: @NewsNBC @EnvAgencyMids Well done to those championing this situation, locals will remember those who stood up and gave a voice to this appalling situation.

@sunnyraisin62 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC Call for an independent enquiry... the whole thing smells. (Pardon the pun!) 2000+ people are not complaining for the sake of it. Our community is at their absolute wits end with this. We need our elected officials to step up, be brave & bring this to an end. Enough is enough
@EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg How much are they paying you to turn a blind eye üëÅ

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC Shut the EA down, our taxes pay wages & this, if true is incompetence, what were we breathing at the weekend, how convenient for red industries that the electricity wasn't working, how convenient you didn't send officer out, when was last time you did send officer out?

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC What is it actually going take for you all know how serious this is? It's affecting our local hospital at the worst possible moment. We will have a massive surge of mental health and not just covid related and if thats not bad enough this weekend we struggled breath.
